item.title: About Web3
item.description: To understand web3 it helps to briefly review what is meant by web1 and web2. web1 was a decentralised internet. People would host their own websites and emails on their own servers at home. Over time, things started to become more centralised. People began instead choosing to publish their content on centralised platforms like myspace, facebook, reddit, instagram and so forth and to entrust their email to the likes of Hotmail and gmail.
